ARABIC: إِنَّ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱخْتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ لَءَايَٰتٍ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَٰبِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the alternation of night and day, there are Signs for people with intelligence:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In the creation of the heavens and the earth, the alternation of night and day, are signs for the wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely in the creation of the heavens and the earth, and in the alternation of night and day, there are signs for men of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the day and the night are evidence (of the existence of God) for people of reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Undoubtedly in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of night and day are signs for the intelligent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, in the creation of the heavens and the Earth, and in the alternation of night and day, there are indeed signs for men of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day there are signs for men who understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely in the creation of the heavens and earth and in the alternation of night and day there are signs for men possessed of minds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! In the creation of the heavens and the earth and (in) the difference of night and day are tokens (of His Sovereignty) for men of understanding,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There are signs in the creation of the heavens and the earth, and in the alternation of night and day for people of understanding;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily in the creation of the heavens and the earth and in the alter nation of the night and the day are signs Unto the men of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of night and day, there are signs for those who possess intellect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold! in the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the alternation of night and day,- there are indeed Signs for men of understanding,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! In the creation of the heavens and the earth, and in the alternation of night and day, there are indeed signs for men of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, in the creation of the heavens and the earth, and in the alternation of night and day, there are signs for those with minds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In the creation of the heavens and the earth, and in the alternation of night and day, are signs for people of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day are signs for those of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:190] Surely in the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the marvels contained in them, and in the alternation of night and day, coming and going, increasing and diminishing, there are signs, indications of God’s power, for people of pith, for people possessing intellects.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then exposited on the sign of His ability to the unbelievers of Mecca when they said: "0 Muhammad, bring us a clear sign to prove what you are saying", saying: (Lo! In the creation of the heavens) in that which We created in the heavens of angels, the sun, moon, stars and clouds (and the earth) and in the creation of the earth and what is in it of mountains, seas, trees and beasts (and (in) the difference of night and day) and in the alternation of day and night (are tokens (of His sovereignty)) signs of His divine Oneness (for men of understanding) for those among them who have reasons, 79
